DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Collecting store sample blood urine patient cancer study laboratory may help doctor learn change may occur DNA identify biomarkers related cancer . PURPOSE : This laboratory study look biomarkers patient undergo transrectal ultrasound prostate biopsy .
DOC.brief_title: Biomarkers Patients Undergoing Transrectal Ultrasound Prostate Biopsy
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - Identify unique protein peptide associated prostate cancer compare proteomic metabolomic analysis serum , plasma , urine patient histological evidence prostate cancer without prostate cancer ( transrectal ultrasound prostatic biopsy ) . Secondary - Collect seminal fluid subset patient test hypothesis fluid collect `` target organ injury '' prostate cancer high signal proteins/peptides different without cancer may help guide identification difference serum , plasma , urine . OUTLINE : This pilot study . Patients undergo collection serum , plasma , urine biomarker/laboratory analysis . Samples examine proteomic/metabolomic analysis ( mass spectrometry ) immunoassay . Patients undergo transrectal ultrasonography prostatic biopsy . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 60 patient accrue study .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Indication transrectal ultrasonography prostatic biopsy ( part normal patient care ) due elevate prostatespecific antigen , abnormal digital rectal examination , surveillance prostate cancer PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : No prior concurrent malignancy except curatively treat basal cell carcinoma skin No serious medical psychiatric illness would preclude informed consent No concurrent acute illness PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : No participation another clinical trial within past 30 day No one enrollment study
